content:
https://github.com/backdrop/backdrop-issues/issues/4478 is RTBC. Can I please get someone to add the 1.16.3 milestone, if you agree that it is a good candidate for it?

Allow partial matching in path autocomplete text fields. 路 Issue #4478 路 backdrop/backdrop-issues
This is a follow-up to #3764 Go to admin/config/system/site-information (or any place where there's a path autocomplete field really) Try typing "your" in any of the "Default hom...
It may seem that 1.17.0 will be kinda "light" feature-wise, but I would like to say that I love the work in the issue queue! ...thank you @all for this great teamwork :heart: :high_five:

Hello,

No one will ever receive or read this email!

I will be on sabbatical from August through December, returning to work in January 2021. During this time email sent to jack@palantetech.coop will not be delivered to any mailbox.

If you have any questions or would like help from Palante, please get in touch with your other contacts at the coop, email team@palantetech.coop or visit https://palantetech.coop/contact to get in touch that way. If you are an existing client you can also email tickets@palantetech.coop to get support more quickly.

Saludos,
Jack
@klonos I agree, this is the first time in a while where I haven't been able to read all the github replies in my inbox :) thank you everyone!
Oooh!!! ...there's so much work for @quicksketch :sweat_smile: ...although props to @BWPanda++ once again for merging/closing so many issues.
@klonos I changed my username yesterday (removed (Peter)), so guess I'm starting from scratch :wink:
@BWPanda ++ again then :smile:

@BWPanda I believe that #4524 should be merged soon. It's just a simple one-liner that fixes an annoyance that I keep coming across in each PR sandbox and every local installation where I'm testing things. ...or are you perhaps waiting for another committer to do the honors?

[UX] Tab index: Password toggle should come after password field 路 Issue #4524 路 backdrop/backdrop-issues
This is a follow-up to #3048 Before that change, you could do this: Focus the username field (won't be needed after #4183 ) Type your username. Press tab -> the password field gets focus T...

Yes, because I was the one who marked it as RTBC, I was waiting for either more confirmation of that, or another core committer to merge it. I didn't want to assume @quicksketch's comment was an endorsement of the RTBC status, since it sounds like he's just referring to the issue in general...

1.16.3 and 1.17.0 might look thin from a marketing perspective. And even then only at first sight. :smile:

These milestones are rather evidence for an accidental "Backdrop Summer of Code", fixing a bunch of bugs. A true step forward regarding stability and reliability.
